participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is an imaginative and playful girl who loves video games more than school. She can be shy but is very passionate about her interests.
participant_1.background: i love to play pobox. i am a 12 year old girl. i don't have many friends. i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is an adventurous and outdoorsy individual who enjoys a good cup of coffee. He is practical and down-to-earth, with a dislike for fads.
participant_2.background: i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker. i'm a huge coffee lover. i hate the color pink. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.
